title: Reclining Bound Angle
description: Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Supporting your knees with your hands, straighten your legs with an exhale. Relax knees but do not push toward floor Tuck shoulder blades under Draw chin toward chest Modification: Support your knees on blocks or blankets. Avoid this pose if you have groin injury.
